mapper.delete: delete /*+ parallel(a, 4)*/ FROM zord_stc_org a where audit_id = 'batch-java'
delete /*+ parallel(a, 4)*/ FROM zord_smry_stc_org_tmp a where audit_id = 'batch-java'
mapper.insert: insert into zord_stc_org ( org_id , org_lvl , org_nm , org_abbr_nm , org_cd , sub_org_cd , sup_org_id , sup_org_cd , sup_sub_org_cd , sup_org_nm , org_cl_cd , mkt_div_org_id , org_typ_cd , warea_cd , area_cd , aply_sta_dt , aply_end_dt , virtual_org_typ_cd , ss_gr_cd , as_cntr_typ_cd , del_yn , actvn_yn , ser_num , audit_id , audit_dtm , co_cl_cd , ref_org_id ) select zo.org_id ,case when zo.org_id = 'A000000000' then 1 else 0 end org_lvl ,zo.org_nm ,zo.org_abbr_nm ,zo.org_cd ,zo.sub_org_cd ,case when zo.org_id = 'A000000000' then 'A00000' else zo.sup_org_id end sup_org_id ,zo.sup_org_cd ,zo.sup_sub_org_cd ,zo.sup_org_nm ,zo.org_cl_cd ,case when zo.org_id <> 'A000000000' then 'A000000000' else zo.org_id end mkt_div_org_id ,zo.org_typ_cd ,zo.warea_cd ,zo.area_cd ,zo.aply_sta_dt ,zo.aply_end_dt ,zo.virtual_org_typ_cd ,null ,zo.as_cntr_typ_cd ,zo.del_yn ,zo.actvn_yn ,zord_stc_org_s.NEXTVAL ,'batch-java' ,sysdate ,zo.co_cl_cd ,zo.ref_org_id from zngm_org zo ,zngm_comm_cd_dtl zccd where zo.org_typ_cd in ('100','110','120','130','140') and zo.co_cl_cd = 'T' and zccd.comm_cd_id(+) = 'ZSTS_P_SKT_ORG120' and zo.org_id = zccd.comm_cd_val(+) and zccd.eff_end_dt(+) > to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD') and zccd.comm_cd_val is null

insert into zord_stc_org ( org_id , org_lvl , org_nm , org_abbr_nm , org_cd , sub_org_cd , sup_org_id , sup_org_cd , sup_sub_org_cd , sup_org_nm , org_cl_cd , mkt_div_org_id , org_typ_cd , warea_cd , area_cd , aply_sta_dt , aply_end_dt , virtual_org_typ_cd , ss_gr_cd , as_cntr_typ_cd , del_yn , actvn_yn , ser_num , audit_id , audit_dtm , co_cl_cd , ref_org_id ) select zo.org_id ,'2' ,zo.org_nm ,zo.org_abbr_nm ,zo.org_cd ,zo.sub_org_cd ,'A000000000' ,'A00000' ,'0000' ,'SK텔레콤' ,zo.org_cl_cd ,zo.org_id mkt_div_org_id ,'210' ,zo.warea_cd ,zo.area_cd ,zo.aply_sta_dt ,zo.aply_end_dt ,zo.virtual_org_typ_cd ,null ,zo.as_cntr_typ_cd ,zo.del_yn ,zo.actvn_yn ,zord_stc_org_s.NEXTVAL ,'batch-java' ,sysdate ,zo.co_cl_cd ,zo.ref_org_id from zngm_org zo ,zngm_comm_cd_dtl zccd where 1=1 and zccd.comm_cd_id = 'ZSTS_P_SKT_ORG120' and zo.org_id = zccd.comm_cd_val and zccd.eff_end_dt(+) > to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD') and zccd.comm_cd_val is not null

= 'C210900000' then 'B21132' when zo.org_id = 'C310900000' then 'B31132' when zo.org_id = 'C410900000' then 'B41155' when zo.org_id = 'C610900000' then 'B61168' when zo.org_id = 'A109050000' then = 'B600800000' then 'B61168' else zo.sup_org_cd end ) as sup_org_cd ,'0000' sup_sub_org_cd ,(case when zo.org_typ_cd = '210' and zo.area_cd = '1' then '수도권마케팅본부' when zo.org_typ_cd = '210' and zo.area_cd = '2' then '부산마케팅본부' when zo.org_typ_cd = '210' and zo.area_cd = '3' then '대구마케팅본부' when zo.org_typ_cd = '210' and zo.area_cd = '4' then '서부마케팅본부' when zo.org_typ_cd = '210' and zo.area_cd = '5' then '서부마케팅본부' when zo.org_typ_cd = '210' and zo.area_cd = '9' then '서부마케팅본부' when zo.org_typ_cd = '210' and zo.area_cd = '6' then '중부마케팅본부' when zo.org_typ_cd = '210' and zo.area_cd = '7' then '중부마케팅본부' when zo.org_typ_cd = '210' and zo.area_cd = '8' then '중부마케팅본부' when zo.org_id = 'C110900000' then 'Biz마케팅본부' when zo.org_id = 'C110910000' then 'Biz마케팅본부' when zo.org_id = 'C110950000' then ,zo.warea_cd ,zo.area_cd ,zo.aply_sta_dt ,zo.aply_end_dt ,zo.virtual_org_typ_cd ,null ,zo.as_cntr_typ_cd ,zo.del_yn ,zo.actvn_yn ,zord_stc_org_s.NEXTVAL ,'batch-java' ,sysdate ,zo.co_cl_cd ,zo.ref_org_id from zngm_org zo where zo.org_typ_cd in ('210','201') and zo.org_id in ('B109000000', 'B209000000', 'B309000000', 'B409000000', 'B509000000', 'B609000000', 'B709000000', 'B809000000', insert into zord_stc_org ( org_id , org_lvl , org_nm , org_abbr_nm , org_cd , sub_org_cd , sup_org_id , sup_org_cd , sup_sub_org_cd , sup_org_nm , org_cl_cd , org_typ_cd , warea_cd , area_cd , aply_sta_dt , aply_end_dt , virtual_org_typ_cd , ss_gr_cd , as_cntr_typ_cd , del_yn , actvn_yn , ser_num , audit_id , audit_dtm , co_cl_cd , ref_org_id ) select /*+ parallel(zo 4) */ zo.org_id ,case when zo.sub_org_cd = 'A000' then 4 else 5 end org_lvl ,org_nm ,org_abbr_nm ,org_cd ,sub_org_cd ,sup_org_id ,sup_org_cd ,sup_sub_org_cd ,sup_org_nm ,org_cl_cd ,org_typ_cd ,warea_cd ,area_cd ,aply_sta_dt ,aply_end_dt ,virtual_org_typ_cd ,null ,as_cntr_typ_cd ,del_yn ,actvn_yn ,zord_stc_org_s.NEXTVAL ,'batch-java' ,sysdate ,zo.co_cl_cd ,zo.ref_org_id from zngm_org zo where 1 = case when zo.org_typ_cd in ('500','501','510','511','520','521','530','531','540','541') then 1 when zo.org_id in ('V992200000','V992240000') then 1 else 0 end and zo.co_cl_cd = 'T'

insert into zord_stc_org ( org_id , org_lvl , org_nm , org_abbr_nm , org_cd , sub_org_cd , sup_org_id , sup_org_cd , sup_sub_org_cd , sup_org_nm , org_cl_cd , org_typ_cd , warea_cd , area_cd , aply_sta_dt , aply_end_dt , virtual_org_typ_cd , ss_gr_cd , as_cntr_typ_cd , del_yn , actvn_yn , ser_num , audit_id , audit_dtm , co_cl_cd , ref_org_id ) select /*+ parallel(zo, 4) */ zo.org_id ,6 ,zo.org_nm ,zo.org_abbr_nm ,zo.org_cd ,zo.sub_org_cd ,zol.org_id ,zol.org_cd ,zol.sub_org_cd ,zol.org_nm ,zo.org_cl_cd ,zo.org_typ_cd ,zo.warea_cd ,zo.area_cd ,zo.aply_sta_dt ,zo.aply_end_dt ,zo.virtual_org_typ_cd ,null ,zo.as_cntr_typ_cd ,zo.del_yn ,zo.actvn_yn ,zord_stc_org_s.NEXTVAL ,'batch-java' ,sysdate ,zo.co_cl_cd ,zo.ref_org_id from zngm_org zo ,zngm_org zol ,(select /*+ parallel(zor 4)*/ org_id, rel_org_id from zngm_org_rel zor where zor.org_rel_cl_cd = '03' group by org_id, rel_org_id) zor where zo.org_id = zor.org_id and zo.org_typ_cd in ('600','610','620','630','670','680') and zol.org_typ_cd in ('500','510','520','530','540') and zol.org_id = zor.rel_org_id and zo.co_cl_cd = 'T'

insert into zord_stc_org ( org_id , org_lvl , org_nm , org_abbr_nm , org_cd , sub_org_cd , sup_org_id , sup_org_cd , sup_sub_org_cd , sup_org_nm , org_cl_cd , mkt_div_org_id , org_typ_cd , warea_cd , area_cd , aply_sta_dt , aply_end_dt , virtual_org_typ_cd , ss_gr_cd , as_cntr_typ_cd , del_yn , actvn_yn , ser_num , audit_id , audit_dtm , co_cl_cd , ref_org_id ) select zo.org_id ,0 ,zo.org_nm ,zo.org_abbr_nm ,zo.org_cd ,zo.sub_org_cd ,zo.sup_org_id ,zo.sup_org_cd ,zo.sup_sub_org_cd ,zo.sup_org_nm ,zo.org_cl_cd ,'A000000000' mkt_div_org_id ,zo.org_typ_cd ,zo.warea_cd ,zo.area_cd ,zo.aply_sta_dt ,zo.aply_end_dt ,zo.virtual_org_typ_cd ,null ,zo.as_cntr_typ_cd ,zo.del_yn ,zo.actvn_yn ,zord_stc_org_s.NEXTVAL ,'batch-java' ,sysdate ,zo.co_cl_cd ,zo.ref_org_id from zngm_org zo where zo.org_typ_cd in ('690') and zo.co_cl_cd = 'T'

insert into zord_smry_stc_org_tmp ( org_id , lvl_sup_org_id , lvl_ssup_org_id , org_lvl , ser_num , audit_id , audit_dtm ) select /*+ full(zso) parallel(zso 4)*/ substr(sys_connect_by_path(rpad(zso.org_id,10),':'),2,10) org_id ,zso.org_id lvl_sup_org_id ,zso.sup_org_id lvl_ssup_org_id ,level seq ,to_number(substr(sys_connect_by_path(rpad(zso.ser_num,10),':'),2,10)) ser_num ,'batch-java' ,sysdate from zord_stc_org zso start with org_id in (select /*+ parallel(zsol 4) */ zsol.org_id from zord_stc_org zsol where zsol.org_id <> 'A000000000' and co_cl_cd ='T' start with zsol.org_id = 'A000000000' connect by prior zsol.org_id = zsol.sup_org_id) connect by prior zso.sup_org_id = zso.org_id
